name: Basic Game Experiment and Manifesto
description:
This was a combination of 2 different HW assignments for 2 classes. One required me to "make a game" and the other one required a manifesto. I worked on the project and eventually came to the point it is at now which I'm broadly pretty happy with. 

WASD to move. Space to jump. Shift to run or walk, it depends. For the W5D2 games, walk next to the coins and not directly towards them. Press esc to close.
